about_the_game:
A NEW UNDERGRÔUND STAGE

Ô is a new kind of musical roguelike centered on techno. We work in tight collaboration with artists and labels to bring their music to life. Experience the sound in your own way and reach the best score before the end of the mix.

GROOVE TO FIND THE MOVE

Dance with any instrument of the tracks in each level. Compose your own choreography based on bass, drums, melodies or lyrics. You'll encounter other enemy dancers with their own moveset. Move as close to them at the right timing to electrocute the closest ones, flirt with them ! It's a french game after all...

But not too close, you'll get hurt and it will ruin the show.

GEAR UP

Unlock upgrades, customize automated weapons activated by the sounds of the music. You'll earn resources along the way that you can spend to come up with the best strategy. Find out which weapon works best with each kind of sound you hear.

  • "This bass had massive volume and long sustained notes...I can slide to it."

  • "This automated weapon works best connected to this gatling gun drum beat !"

  • "If I stack this passive upgrade, it will boost the voice track's power."

DIG THE MAP

Explore the procedurally generated map. In it, you'll encounter fights, time trials or several recurrent rooms filled with all kinds of upgrades. The map generation can be customized in many ways to make sure it adapts to your needs and strategy. Better get moving though ! Time is ticking and the end of the song is coming.

PRICK UP YOUR EAR

Pay close attention to the music, events will occur as it progresses. Get ready for a boss fight on the drop. Take advantadge of respites to spend your resources and rethink your strategy. Soon enough, you'll read music instinctively and vibe with all of its variations.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 (El Capitan) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 (4 * 3200)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Ô

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10500 (more or less)
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Here's your stage. Dance to any instrument of the mix and reach the best score. You won't be dancing alone so give us a great show !
